landing.noapp: Ozali na mposa ya appli te mpo na kosalela {{ BRAND }} na telefone to na tablette na yo!
landing.intro: {{BRAND}} ({{TRANSLITERATION}}) ezali lolenge malamu ya kokutana na baninga ya sika.  {{ BRAND }}, toponaka moto mosusu na mbalakaka mpe totikaka yo osolola moko na moko.   <6>Mibeko mpe makambo oyo etali yango</6>, mpe <8>Mabongisi ya lisanga</8> pona info sur de do's na don'ts na kosalela {{ BRAND }}. {{ BRAND }} video chat eza AI modéré mais moderation moko te eza parfaits.  {{ BRAND }}
landing.disclaimer: <0>Esengeli ozala na mibu 18 (to majorité juridique na jurisdiction na yo) to koleka mpo na kosalela {{BRAND}}</0>.  {{BRAND}}'s <4>Mibeko mpe makambo oyo etali yango</4> pona ba infos ebele.  <6>https://www.connectsafely.org/controls</6> lokola mpe bisika mosusu.
landing.pleaseleave: Svp tika Lamdazle pe kota na site ya mikóló na esika na yango soki yango nde ozali koluka pe ozali na mbula 18 (to majorité juridique na jurisdiction na yo) to koleka.
landing.termscheck: Na kotiya elembo na esika oyo ondimi ete otali lisusu mokanda oyo ondimi ete okangami na yango {{BRAND}}'s <3>Mibeko mpe makambo oyo etali yango</3>, . <5>Politiki ya kobatela makambo ya moto ye moko</5> mpe <7>Mabongisi ya lisanga</7>.
landing.agecheck: Okoki kosalela service oyo te soki ozali na se ya mbula 18 to ozali na mbula ya majorité juridique na jurisdiction na yo.  <1>Mibeko mpe makambo oyo etali yango</1> pona ba infos ebele. <3>Na kotiya elembo na esika oyo ondimi mpe ozali komonisa ete ozali na mibu 18 (to bato mingi oyo mibeko epesi nzela na etuka na yo) to koleka.</3>
